pkgmetadata.longdescription: Inference of Transmission Tree from a Dated Phylogeny // Inference of transmission tree from a dated phylogeny. Includes methods to simulate and analyse outbreaks. The methodology is described in Didelot et al. (2014) doi:10.1093/molbev/msu121, Didelot et al. (2017) doi:10.1093/molbev/msw275.
